import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Navbar from 'src/components/Navbar/Navbar' import Footer from 'src/components/Footer/Footer' import axios from 'axios' const Home = ({isLoggedin, user}) => { const[blogs, setBlogs] = useState([]) const fetchData=async()=>{ try{ const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/home/') console.log("API Response: ", response) setBlogs(response.data) }catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error.message); } } useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return ( <>
